.@NinoLeitner: "Please consider lenses as investment. A good lens w/ cheap camera is more effective than a combination the other way round."
.@NinoLeitner: "The ZEISS LWZ.3 has the right focal length range for documentary work - wide enough and long enough."
.@NinoLeitner: "The Interchangeable Mount System provides the necessary versatility when you work with different camera types."
.@NinoLeitner: "Autofocus for video shoots - e.g. with Batis lenses - can work pretty well but manual focus provides more control."
.@NinoLeitner: "If you invest in new video equipment & want an affordable & compact setup
column4: go for the Alpha 7 series w/ Loxia/Batis lenses."

text: .@NinoLeitner: "When comparing lenses for sharpness
column4: always do it wide open. Otherwise it won't be possible to really judge it correctly."

text: .@NinoLeitner: "Hard focus stops and a long focus throw are essential when choosing photo lenses for video shoots."
.@NinoLeitner: "Choosing the right lens depends heavily on the job you have to do."
